participant_1.background:
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
i am a father.

participant_2.background:
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
My family are avid cyclists as well
i am an out of work farmhand.
I wake up at 5:30 am and practice my music for an hour before my family wakes up.
I just watched Rick and Morty and had a glass of whiskey to calm my nerves.

content.text: pretty good, pretty good.  Just watched Rick and Morty and had a glass of whiskey to calm my nerves.
Nice! I've been meaning to watch that.  Are you big into tv?
I am, I just finished Better Call Saul.  I'm a huge Breaking Bad fan.
Ooh, I've heard good things about it, but I haven't seen it yet.
It's really good, you should check it out.
I will!  What are your favorite shows?
Hmmm, I'd have to say Breaking Bad, Better Call Saul, Game of Thrones, House of Cards, and The Walking Dead.
I've seen Breaking Bad and Game of Thrones, and I really liked them both.  I've heard good things about House of Cards, but I've never seen it.
House of Cards is really good, it's a political thriller.
I'll have to check it out!  What are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet, probably just hanging out with my family.  We're going to go cycling on Saturday morning.
That sounds like fun! I used to be really into cycling, but I haven't done it in a while.
You should get back into it!  It's a great way to get exercise and see the sights.
I will!  I actually have a bike in my garage that I haven't ridden in a while.  I could probably use the exercise.
There you go!  Cycling is a great way to get in shape and it's also fun.
